titles.title: Incentivize Corporate America Act of 2015
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the corporate income tax rate to 20 percent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
6/25/2015--Introduced. Incentivize Corporate America Act of 2015
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise the income tax rates on corporations to impose a single 20% rate on corporate taxable income.
